W04_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W04_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After passing through the door, you find yourself underwater! Hero's darkness has clearly prepared quite the fascinating experience, and you can't wait to see what becomes of it.

W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_DETAIL.text: Someone captivating is in this area.

W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_DETAIL.text: Someone captivating is in this area.

W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_DETAIL.text: Someone captivating is in this area.

W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_040_DETAIL.text: Someone captivating is in this area.

W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE.text: A truly ferocious battle over Deus Maris's egg is about to begin, and Ivar must protect it no matter what. You're also dying to know when Hero will show you the darkness inside him.

W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE.text: Begin the Battle for the Egg

W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE.text: A battle between pirates is about to begin over Deus Maris's egg, a miraculous item said to grant wishes. You're also dying to know when Hero will show you the darkness inside him.

W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE.text: Begin the Battle for the Egg

W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_BASE_WORLDQUEST_LASTBATTLE.text: You now have the finest raft imaginableâ€”but will it be enough to endure the cyclone? You're also dying to know when Hero will show you the darkness inside him.

W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_000_.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_000_.text: The Storm in Dead Man's Bay

W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_000_.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_DEATH_COVE_000_.text: Will taking Deus Maris's egg inside the giant cyclone really make it hatch? You're also dying to know when Hero will show you the darkness inside him.

W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_010_.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_PIRATESHIP_LASTBATTLE_010_.text: Is it possible to stop Baltasar now he has Deus Maris's egg? You're also dying to know when Hero will show you the darkness inside him.

W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LAST_BATTLE_000_.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LAST_BATTLE_000_.text: The time has come for you to defeat the pirate Baltasar and save Deus Maris. You're also dying to know when Hero will show you the darkness inside him.

W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LAST_BATTLE_011_.speaker: UI
W04_EVAR_SIUG_GHOSTSHIP_LAST_BATTLE_011_.text: The time has come to face off with the pirate Baltasar, so you must hurry to the giant cyclone. You're also dying to know when Hero will show you the darkness within him.
